author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Get rid of the namespace in volume declaration for translating DDD geometry. 

#### PR validation:

Tested by using the TGEO to VecGeom interface to test GeantV geometry. Could not find application requiring the namespace

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-fwk01 replace fullname() with name() in creating TGEO geometry
